weka.classifiers.mi.miti
Class AlgorithmConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  weka.classifiers.mi.miti.AlgorithmConfiguration

public class AlgorithmConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

Stores parameters that determine the configuration of the algorithm.

Field Summary
 int attributeSplitChoices
          The number of top ranked attribute splits to randomly pick from (default value 1 has no randomness)
 int attributesToSplit
          The number of attributes randomly selected to find the best from.
 double bagCountMultiplier
          The value used to determine the influence of instance counts when using bag counts.
 int kBEPPConstant
          The constant used to scale the influence of a node's size on its split score.
 int method
          The method used to score a split (1 = Gini, 2 = Max BEPP, 3 = SSBEPP)
 boolean unbiasedEstimate
          Determines whether an unbiased score is used to estimate the proportion of positives
 boolean useBagStatistics
          Determines whether bag stats are used to score splits, or instance stats.
 
Constructor Summary
AlgorithmConfiguration()
          Default constructor that assigns default values.
AlgorithmConfiguration(int method, boolean unbiasedEstimate, int kBEPPConstant, boolean bagStatistics, double bagCountMultiplier, int attributesToSplit, int attributeSplitChoices)
          Constructor that sets algorithm parameters based on arguments.
 
Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Field Detail

method

public int method
The method used to score a split (1 = Gini, 2 = Max BEPP, 3 = SSBEPP)

unbiasedEstimate

public boolean unbiasedEstimate
Determines whether an unbiased score is used to estimate the proportion of positives

kBEPPConstant

public int kBEPPConstant
The constant used to scale the influence of a node's size on its split score.

useBagStatistics

public boolean useBagStatistics
Determines whether bag stats are used to score splits, or instance stats.

bagCountMultiplier

public double bagCountMultiplier
The value used to determine the influence of instance counts when using bag counts. Multiplier is used as M^(instance count for bag), where M is the bag count multiplier. Default value 0.5

attributesToSplit

public int attributesToSplit
The number of attributes randomly selected to find the best from. -1: All attributes, -2: Square root of total attribute count

attributeSplitChoices

public int attributeSplitChoices
The number of top ranked attribute splits to randomly pick from (default value 1 has no randomness)

public AlgorithmConfiguration()
Default constructor that assigns default values.

                              int kBEPPConstant,
